item.description:
IBD Method Group

Please RSVP!

We will be having our third Newbie Pre-Meeting class this month. It will focus on CANSLIM basics. If you are new to the CANSLIM Method, come at 6. If you are more advanced and want to skip the basics, come at 7.


This month's agenda:

  • 6:00 - 7:00 - CANSLIM Basics for Newbies - Chris - -
  • 7:00 - 7:15 - Intro to main meeting - Jeff
  • 7:15 - 7:30 - IBD Market Report - Keith
  • 7:30 - 8:00 - Open Discussion - Jeff
  • 8:00 - 8:30 - IBD Stock Guides - Steve Steve Weiser will look at the some of the stocks in the August Earnings edition of the IBD Stock Guides.
  • 8:30 - 9:00 - Stock Screens - Peter
  • 9:00 - 9:30 - Stock Picks - Jeff



Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.




  • We have our own Google Group - IBDLevels. This is a moderated discussion that is also an IBD centric Google Group and its home page says as much. Join it via this link: http://groups.google....

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: IBD Method Group - with Newbie Pre-Meeting Class
